001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.ElementType;
004import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
005import java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy;
006import java.lang.annotation.Target;
007import org.junit.jupiter.api.Tag;
008
009/**
010 * Marks a test or test class as part of the Smoke Test Suite.
011 *
012 * <p>This annotation is used to categorize test methods or entire test classes
013 * as "Smoke" tests. Smoke tests are typically a subset of test cases
014 * that verify the most critical functionalities of an application.
015 *
016 * <p>The annotation is retained at runtime and applies to both class and method levels.
017 * It also integrates with JUnit 5 by applying the {@code @Tag("Smoke")} annotation,
018 * allowing test filtering via tags.
019 *
020 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
021 */
022@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
023@Target({ElementType.TYPE, ElementType.METHOD})
024@Tag("Smoke")
025public @interface Smoke {
026
027}
